mapper.select:
select count(*) from productService a ,serviceSpace b ,bizModelSpace c ,valueSpace d where a.id = b.psId and a.id = c.psId and a.id = d.psId
and a.id = #{id}
and a.id in ( #{a} )
and ((UPPER(a.name) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(a.description) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (a.lastModifiedUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.createdUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (UPPER(b.sspp) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.ssp) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.sspc) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.ssc) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.sscc) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.customerSegments) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.customerSegmentsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.CustomerRelationships) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.CustomerRelationshipsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.channels) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.channelsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyActivities) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyActivitiesUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyResources) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyResourcesUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyPartners) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyPartnersUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.costStructure) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.costStructureUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.revenueStreams) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.revenueStreamsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(d.economical) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(d.ecological) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(d.function) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(d.extrinsicSocial) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(d.activeEmotional) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(d.reactiveEmotional) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(d.intrinsicSocial) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(d.epistemic) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') )

select count(*) from productService a ,serviceSpace b ,bizModelSpace c where a.id = b.psId and a.id = c.psId
and a.id = #{id}
and a.id in ( #{a} )
and ((UPPER(a.name) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(a.description) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (a.lastModifiedUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.createdUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (UPPER(b.sspp) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.ssp) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.sspc) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.ssc) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.sscc) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.customerSegments) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.customerSegmentsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.CustomerRelationships) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.CustomerRelationshipsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.channels) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.channelsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyActivities) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyActivitiesUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyResources) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyResourcesUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyPartners) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyPartnersUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.costStructure) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.costStructureUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.revenueStreams) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.revenueStreamsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.valuePropositionsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') )

select count(*) from productService a ,valueSpace b ,bizModelSpace c where a.id = b.psId and a.id = c.psId
and a.id = #{id}
and a.id in ( #{a} )
and ((UPPER(a.name) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(a.description) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(a.lastModifiedUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(a.createdUser like) '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.economical) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.ecological) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.function) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.extrinsicSocial) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.activeEmotional) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.reactiveEmotional) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.intrinsicSocial) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.epistemic) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.customerSegments) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.customerSegmentsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.CustomerRelationships) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.CustomerRelationshipsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.channels) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.channelsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyActivities) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyActivitiesUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyResources) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyResourcesUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyPartners) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.keyPartnersUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.costStructure) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.costStructureUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.revenueStreams) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.revenueStreamsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.valuePropositionsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') )

select count(*) from productService a ,valueSpace b ,serviceSpace c where a.id = b.psId and a.id = c.psId
and a.id = #{id}
and a.id in ( #{a} )
and ((UPPER(a.name) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(a.description) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(a.lastModifiedUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(a.createdUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.economical) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.ecological) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.function) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.extrinsicSocial) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.activeEmotional) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.reactiveEmotional) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.intrinsicSocial) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.epistemic) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.sspp) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.ssp) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.sspc) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.ssc) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(c.sscc) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') )

select count(*) from productService a ,bizModelSpace b where a.id = b.psId
and a.id = #{id}
and a.id in ( #{a} )
and (UPPER((a.name) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(a.description) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(a.lastModifiedUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(a.createdUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.customerSegments) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.customerSegmentsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.CustomerRelationships) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.CustomerRelationshipsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.channels) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.channelsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.keyActivities) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.keyActivitiesUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.keyResources) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.keyResourcesUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.keyPartners) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.keyPartnersUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.costStructure) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.costStructureUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.revenueStreams) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.revenueStreamsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') or (UPPER(b.valuePropositionsUser) like '%'|| UPPER(#{searchKey}) ||'%') )
mapper.insert: insert into productService(id, name, picture, description, productServiceSpace, productSpace, touchPointSpace, customerSpace, actorSpace, societySpace, contextSpace, timeSpace, environmentSpace, lastModifiedUser, lastModifiedDate, createdUser, createdDate) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{picture}, #{description}, #{productServiceSpace}, #{productSpace}, #{touchPointSpace}, #{customerSpace}, #{actorSpace}, #{societySpace}, #{contextSpace}, #{timeSpace}, #{environmentSpace}, #{lastModifiedUser}, #{lastModifiedDate}, #{createdUser}, #{createdDate})
mapper.select: select picture from productService where id = #{id}

select * from valueSpace
and id = #{id}
and psId = #{psId}
and economical like '%'|| #{economicalLike} ||'%'
and ecological like '%'|| #{ecologicalLike} ||'%'
and function like '%'|| #{functionLike} ||'%'
and extrinsicSocial like '%'|| #{extrinsicSocialLike} ||'%'
and activeEmotional like '%'|| #{activeEmotionalLike} ||'%'
and reactiveEmotional like '%'|| #{reactiveEmotionalLike} ||'%'
and intrinsicSocial like '%'|| #{intrinsicSocialLike} ||'%'
and epistemic like '%'|| #{epistemicLike} ||'%'
order by ${orderQuery}
mapper.insert: insert into valueSpace(id, psId, economical, ecological, function, extrinsicSocial, activeEmotional, reactiveEmotional, intrinsicSocial, epistemic) values (#{id}, #{psId}, #{economical}, #{ecological}, #{function}, #{extrinsicSocial}, #{activeEmotional}, #{reactiveEmotional}, #{intrinsicSocial}, #{epistemic})
insert into serviceSpace(id, psId, sspp, ssp, sspc, ssc, sscc) values (#{id}, #{psId}, #{sspp}, #{ssp}, #{sspc}, #{ssc}, #{sscc})
mapper.select:
select * from bizModelSpace
and id = #{id}
and psId = #{psId}
and customerSegments like '%'|| #{customerSegmentsLike} ||'%'
and customerSegmentsUser like '%'|| #{customerSegmentsUserLike} ||'%'
and CustomerRelationships like '%'|| #{CustomerRelationshipsLike} ||'%'
and CustomerRelationshipsUser like '%'|| #{CustomerRelationshipsUserLike} ||'%'
and channels like '%'|| #{channelsLike} ||'%'
and channelsUser like '%'|| #{channelsUserLike} ||'%'
and keyActivities like '%'|| #{keyActivitiesLike} ||'%'
and keyActivitiesUser like '%'|| #{keyActivitiesUserLike} ||'%'
and keyResources like '%'|| #{keyResourcesLike} ||'%'
and keyResourcesUser like '%'|| #{keyResourcesUserLike} ||'%'
and keyPartners like '%'|| #{keyPartnersLike} ||'%'
and keyPartnersUser like '%'|| #{keyPartnersUserLike} ||'%'
and costStructure like '%'|| #{costStructureLike} ||'%'
and costStructureUser like '%'|| #{costStructureUserLIke} ||'%'
and revenueStreams like '%'|| #{revenueStreamsLike} ||'%'
and revenueStreamsUser like '%'|| #{revenueStreamsUserLIke} ||'%'
and valuePropositionsUser like '%'|| #{valuePropositionssUserLIke} ||'%'
order by ${orderQuery}
mapper.insert: insert into bizModelSpace(id, psId, customerSegments, customerSegmentsUser, CustomerRelationships, CustomerRelationshipsUser, channels, channelsUser, keyActivities, keyActivitiesUser, keyResources, keyResourcesUser, keyPartners, keyPartnersUser, costStructure, costStructureUser, revenueStreams, revenueStreamsUser, valuePropositionsUser) values (#{id}, #{psId}, #{customerSegments}, #{customerSegmentsUser}, #{CustomerRelationships}, #{CustomerRelationshipsUser}, #{channels}, #{channelsUser}, #{keyActivities}, #{keyActivitiesUser}, #{keyResources}, #{keyResourcesUser}, #{keyPartners}, #{keyPartnersUser}, #{costStructure}, #{costStructureUser}, #{revenueStreams}, #{revenueStreamsUser}, #{valuePropositionsUser})

insert into orgUser(id, passwd, name, authId, picture, mobileNo, homePhoneNo, homeAddress, locale, timeZone, creator, createdTime, modifier, modifiedTime, company) values (#{id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{authId}, #{picture}, #{mobileNo}, #{homePhoneNo}, #{homeAddress}, #{locale}, #{timeZone}, #{creator}, #{createdTime}, #{modifier}, #{modifiedTime}, #{company} )
mapper.select: select distinct level1 from "unspscCode" order by level1
select distinct level2 from "unspscCode" where level1 = #{level1} order by level2
select distinct level3 from "unspscCode" where level1 = #{level1} and level2 = #{level2} order by level3
select distinct level4 from "unspscCode" where level1 = #{level1} and level2 = #{level2} and level3 = #{level3} order by level4
select id, name from "unspscNames" where level2 = '00' and locale = #{locale} order by id
select id, name from "unspscNames" where level1 = #{level1} and not(level2 = '00') and level3 = '00' and locale = #{locale} order by id
select id, name from "unspscNames" where level1 = #{level1} and level2 = #{level2} and not(level3 = '00') and level4 = '00' and locale = #{locale} order by id
select id, name from "unspscNames" where level1 = #{level1} and level2 = #{level2} and level3 = #{level3} and not(level4 = '00') and locale = #{locale} order by id
select id, name from "customerTypes" where level2 = '00' and locale = #{locale} order by id
select id, name from "customerTypes" where level1 = #{level1} and not(level2 = '00') and level3 = '00' and locale = #{locale} order by id
select id, name from "customerTypes" where level1 = #{level1} and level2 = #{level2} and not(level3 = '00') and level4 = '00' and locale = #{locale} order by id
select id, name from "customerTypes" where level1 = #{level1} and level2 = #{level2} and level3 = #{level3} and not(level4 = '00') and locale = #{locale} order by id
select name from "customerTypes" where id = #{id} and locale = 'en' order by name
mapper.update: update servicespace set sspp = #{sspp}, ssp = #{ssp}, sspc = #{sspc}, ssc = #{ssc}, sscc = #{sscc} where psId = #{psId}
mapper.select: select sspc from servicespace where id = #{id}
select * from servicespace where psid = #{psId}
select * from hvmproject where pssprjid = #{psId}
select sbpprjname from hvmproject where pssprjid = #{psId}
mapper.insert: insert into hvmproject (id, pssprjid, pssprjname, pssprjpicture, pssprjdescription, sbpprjid, sbpprjname, createduser, createddate) values(#{id}, #{psId}, #{psName}, #{picture}, #{psDesc}, #{puId}, #{sbpPrjName}, #{createdUser}, #{createdDate})
